nodes.text: Mok Cadrak was as male Devaronian who worked for the Hutt Riboga during the time of the Clone Wars.

Cadrak was one of Riboga's lead enforcers and following Riboga's return to the Cularin system, the Hutt sent Cadrak to the city Tolea Biqua on the planet Genarius, to attack a number of criminal gang's that had refused to submit to Riboga. Cadrak lead a group of 12 thugs in an attack on members of the Lurid Gundarks gang, but he was defeated by the Gundarks and the Heroes of Cularin.
